33 WMGravityModel::WMGravityModel(const std::vector<std::string>& pTFNames, size_t pActuatorCount, bool pVerboseMode) :
34  aTFNames(pTFNames),
35  aActuatorCount(pActuatorCount),
36  aVerboseMode(pVerboseMode)
37 {
38  aJointTransform.resize(aActuatorCount);
39  aRotationMatrix.resize(aActuatorCount + 1);
40  aTranslationVector.resize(aActuatorCount + 1);
41  aAccelerationVector.resize(aActuatorCount + 1);
42  aForce.resize(aActuatorCount);
43  aBackwardForce.resize(aActuatorCount + 1);
44  aBackwardTorque.resize(aActuatorCount + 1);
45  aCompensatedTorque.resize(aActuatorCount);
46 
47  // Get only needed information from URDF file
48  utilities::URDFHelper lURDFParser;
49  aRobotData = lURDFParser.getRobotData(aActuatorCount);
50 }
51 
58 CompensatedTorqueVector WMGravityModel::process()
59 {
60  aJointTransform = retrievePositionFromTF();
61  retrieveTransformInformation();
62 
63  aAccelerationVector[0].setValue(0.0, 0.0, -9.81); // adding gravity
64 
65  aBackwardForce[aActuatorCount].setZero();
66  aBackwardTorque[aActuatorCount].setZero();
67 
68  for (size_t i{0}; i < aActuatorCount; ++i)
69  {
70  aAccelerationVector[i + 1] = aRotationMatrix[i].transpose() * aAccelerationVector[i];
71  aForce[i] = aRobotData.aLinkMass[i] * aAccelerationVector[i + 1];
72  }
73 
74  for (size_t i{aActuatorCount}; i > 0; --i)
75  {
76  aBackwardForce[i - 1] = aRotationMatrix[i] * aBackwardForce[i] + aForce[i - 1];
77  aBackwardTorque[i - 1] = aRotationMatrix[i] * aBackwardTorque[i] + aRobotData.aCenterOfMass[i - 1].cross(aForce[i - 1]) + aTranslationVector[i].cross(aRotationMatrix[i] * aBackwardForce[i]);
78  aCompensatedTorque[i - 1] = aBackwardTorque[i -1].z();
79  }
80 
81  if (aVerboseMode)
82  {
83  size_t lIndex = 0;
84  for (const auto& lTFName : aTFNames)
85  {
86  ROS_INFO("Compensated Torque of %s: %lf", lTFName.c_str(), aCompensatedTorque[lIndex]);
87  ++lIndex;
88  }
89  }
90 
91  return aCompensatedTorque;
92 }
93 
100 std::vector<tf::StampedTransform> WMGravityModel::retrievePositionFromTF()
101 {
102  std::vector<tf::StampedTransform> lTransformList;
103  std::string lLastFrame{gBaseTFName};
104  for (const std::string& lTFName : aTFNames)
105  {
106  try
107  {
108  tf::StampedTransform lTransform;
109  ros::Time lNow = ros::Time::now();
110 
111  if (aListener.waitForTransform(lLastFrame, lTFName, lNow, ros::Duration(0.01)))
112  {
113  aListener.lookupTransform(lLastFrame, lTFName, lNow, lTransform);
114 
115  lTransformList.emplace_back(std::move(lTransform));
116  lLastFrame = lTFName;
117  }
118  }
119  catch (const tf::TransformException& ex)
120  {
121  ROS_ERROR("Failed to retrieve transform of '%s': %s", lTFName.c_str(), ex.what());
122  throw std::runtime_error("Failed to retrieve transform of '" + lTFName +
123  "': " + ex.what());
124  }
125  }
126  return lTransformList;
127 }
128 
132 void WMGravityModel::retrieveTransformInformation()
133 {
134  size_t lActuatorCount{0};
135  for (tf::StampedTransform & lTransform : aJointTransform)
136  {
137  aRotationMatrix[lActuatorCount] = lTransform.getBasis();
138  aTranslationVector[lActuatorCount] = lTransform.getOrigin();
139  ++lActuatorCount;
140  }
141  aRotationMatrix[lActuatorCount].setIdentity();
142  aTranslationVector[lActuatorCount].setZero();
143 }
